channel.title: Shop Trouble
channel.description:
right i added the shop into shop.cfg spawn the npc i want to be the shop but how do i merge the two together eg. when sum1 clicks on the npc the shop opens if ya get what i mean
Help would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Shop Trouble
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

its abit tricky one
Go into client.java and search for:

WanneShop = 2;

And then you should se something like this:

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
And now press enter after, in my exampel, “shop” and type in:

} else if (NPCID == NPCID) { //Any text you want here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOPID; //Any text you want here
And now where it says “NPCID” take it away and add your npcid. And where it says SHOPID you put the shopid of your shop in your shops.cfg, for exampel : shop = 1 And the number 1 is the shop id.

Read full topic
